00021

00023 
00024 - (DKCallbackFromSelector *)initWithSelector:(SEL)s {
00025   if ((self = [super init])) {
00026     selector = s;
00027   }
00028   return self;

00037 @interface DKCallbackFromSelectorWithTarget : DKCallback {
00038   SEL selector;
00039   NSObject *target;
00040 }
00041 
00042 @property(readonly) SEL selector;
00043 @property(readonly) NSObject *target;
00044 - (DKCallbackFromSelectorWithTarget *)initWithSelector:(SEL)s target:(NSObject *)t;
00045 
00046 @end
00047 
00048 @implementation DKCallbackFromSelectorWithTarget
00049 
00050 @synthesize selector, target;
00051 
00052 - (DKCallbackFromSelectorWithTarget *)initWithSelector:(SEL)s target:(NSObject *)t {
00053   if (![t respondsToSelector:s]) {
00054     @throw [NSException 
00055             exceptionWithName:NSInvalidArgumentException 
00056             reason:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"%@ does not respond to selector %s", t, sel_getName(s)]
00057             userInfo:nil];
00058   }
00059   if ((self = [super init])) {
00060     selector = s;
00061     target = [t retain];
00062   }
00063   return self;
00064 }
00065 
00066 - (id):(id)arg {
00067   return [target performSelector:selector withObject:arg];
00068 }
00069 
00070 - (void)dealloc {
00071   [target release];
00072   [super dealloc];
00073 }
00074 
00075 @end

00077 @interface DKCallbackComposition : DKCallback {
00078   DKCallback *f;
00079   DKCallback *g;
00080 }
00081 
00082 - (DKCallbackComposition *)initWithF:(DKCallback *)anF andG:(DKCallback *)aG;
00083 @end
00084 
00085 @implementation DKCallbackComposition
00086 
00087 - (DKCallbackComposition *)initWithF:(DKCallback *)anF andG:(DKCallback *)aG {
00088   if ((self = [super init])) {
00089     f = [anF retain];
00090     g = [aG retain];
00091   }
00092   return self;
00093 }
00094 
00095 - (void)dealloc {
00096   [f release];
00097   [g release];
00098   [super dealloc];
00099 }
00100 
00101 - (id):(id)arg {
00102   return [f :[g :arg]];
00103 }
00104 
00105 @end

00110 - (DKCallback *)initWithPointer:(dkCallback)fp;

00115     theFunction = fp;
00116   }

00125 @interface DKCallbackFromInvocation : DKCallback {
00126   NSInvocation *invocation;
00127   NSUInteger index;
00128 }
00129 - (DKCallback *)initWithInvocation:(NSInvocation *)inv parameterIndex:(NSUInteger)idx;
00130 @end
00131 
00132 @implementation DKCallbackFromInvocation
00133 - (DKCallback *)initWithInvocation:(NSInvocation *)inv parameterIndex:(NSUInteger)idx {
00134   if ((self = [super init])) {
00135     //    NSLog(@"inv: %@", inv);
00136     invocation = [inv retain];
00137     index = idx;
00138   }
00139   return self;
00140 }
00141 - (id):(id)arg {
00142   [invocation setArgument:&arg atIndex:(index + 2)];
00143   [invocation invoke];
00144   id anObject;
00145   [invocation getReturnValue:&anObject];
00146   return anObject;
00147 }
00148 - (void)dealloc {
00149   [invocation release];
00150   [super dealloc];
00151 }
00152 
00153 @end

00158   return [[[DKCallbackFromSelector alloc] initWithSelector:s] autorelease];

00177 - (DKCallback *)andThen:(DKCallback *)other {
00178   return [other composeWith:self];
00179 }
00180 
00181 - (DKCallback *)composeWith:(DKCallback *)other {
00182   return [[DKCallbackComposition alloc] initWithF:self andG:other];
